ShortDescription.Value: No Pollution will stop/remove all pollution from the map

Publish.LongDescription:
# No Pollution Mod
This mod will stop pollution from being produced on the map and remove existing pollution.
## Functionality
This mod will: - Stop noise pollution - Stop ground pollution - Stop air pollution - Stop groundwater pollution - let you control water pollution decay rate with a sldier
## Small Disclaimer
This mod will: - Remove Ground, Air, and Noise pollution - Stop other pollution types
## Roadmap
- Pollution sliders for each type of pollution
